ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was supported by the USGS BRD Pacific Island Ecosystem Research Centre, the National Park Service, the Research Corporation of Hawaii, and the Conselho Nacional do Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq) — Brazil. We thank the company CAF Santa Bárbara Ltda for allowing access to one experimental area (at Dionísio) and providing the climatic data from their climate station. We also thank Dr. Vitor Becker (Universidade Federal de Brasília, Brazil) for identifying of the species of Lepidoptera and Dr.Maria Angélica Penteado-Dias (1 Universidade Federal de São Carlos, Brazil) for identifying the species of parasitoids.
